questiontext.text:
This is an example of an embedded answers (Cloze) type question. This is a multiple choice question but there are other types you can use too.

The first Moodle Research conference was held in {1:MULTICHOICE:Sousse, Tunisia#That was the second~California, USA#That was the third~=Crete, Greece#Correct!~%50%Greece#Yes but not close enough so you only get half the credit.}
